subject.topic: Painting Canadian - 20th century - Exhibitions; McCarthy, Doris, 1910-2010 - Exhibitions

mods.note:
Meet the artist announcement and exhibition "Doris McCarthy: New Works" at Canadian Art Galleries from 1992-04-11 to 1992-05-5. Announcement contains an image of the painting "Bishop's Harbour" 1991. Contains image "Bishop's Harbour,' oil on linen, 5' x 7', 1991.
Item in good condition.

physicalDescription.note: invitations; exhibition openings; colored ink; paper 28 cm x 21.7 cm tiff 196.6 MB
